import React from "react"; import PropTypes from "prop-types"; import '../../assets/styles/styles.css'; import { useState } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; export default function CreateEventForm({ color }) { const url = "http://localhost:8000/event/"; const [event ,setEvent] = useState({ name:"" , description:""}) function submit(e){ e.preventDefault(); console.log(e) axios.post(url,{ title:event.title, description:event.description, date:event.date, time:event.time, venue:event.venue, image:event.image }) .then(res=>{ console.log(res.data) }) } function handle(e){ const newData = {...event} newData[e.target.name]=e.target.value setEvent(newData) console.log(newData) } return ( <>

Create Event

{/* here */}
submit(e)} >
handle(e)} placeholder="Event title...">
handle(e)} >
handle(e)} placeholder="Approx. start time">
handle(e)} placeholder="Event venue">
handle(e)} placeholder="Event venue">
{/* Clear */}
); } CreateEventForm.defaultProps = { color: "light", }; CreateEventForm.propTypes = { color: PropTypes.oneOf(["light", "dark"]), };
